name: Albstadt-Sigmaringen University - University of Engineering and Economics
requirements: Affine undergraduate degree, completion in accordance with applicable admission regulations, or equivalent (e.g., engineers, industrial engineers, business economists, computer scientists, graduates of related disciplines).

name: Fachhochschule of Printing, Stuttgart
requirements: All applicants must apply online via the C@MPUS-Management-Portal. Paper documents will only be required at the time of enrollment. EU citizens must prove their good knowledge of German. Germans and foreigners with German high school certificate can use the application guideline. International study programs and those taught in English have special application procedures.

name: University of Applied Sciences Darmstadt
requirements: Application deadline for Germans and inhabitants: See h-da.de/bewerbungsfristen. Deadlines for International Students from the European Union: See h-da.de/bewerbungsfristen. Deadlines for international students from countries that are not members of the European Union: See h-da.de/bewerbungsfristen. Enrollment deadline for Germans and foreign students: See h-da.de/bewerbungsfristen
